dbError.title: Action Required: Finish Setup
dbError.message: The application could not connect to the database. This is usually due to a configuration issue with your Firebase project.
dbError.unavailableIntro: This app requires a Firestore database to save your work, but it couldn't connect. This is a one-time setup issue that you can fix in 2 minutes.
dbError.setupTitle: How to Fix This in 3 Easy Steps

step1.title: Open your Firebase Project
step1.description: This will take you directly to the Firestore section of your project.

step2.title: Click 'Create database'
step2.description: Follow the on-screen prompts. Starting in 'test mode' is recommended for now.

step3.title: Come back here and 'Try Again'
step3.description: Once the database is created, this error will be resolved.

dbError.check1: Ensure you have created and enabled the 'Firestore Database' in your Firebase project console.
dbError.check2: Verify that your API key in the Firebase Console has no restrictions, or that this app's domain is allowed.
dbError.check3: Check your Firestore Security Rules to ensure they are not blocking read/write access.

automation.promptHint: You can edit this prompt. Use placeholders like `{{TARGET_VIDEO_TITLE}}` or `{{VIRAL_VIDEO_TRANSCRIPT}}` to chain steps.
automation.defaultDescription: Please review and edit the auto-generated description.

step1.name: Viral Analysis & Outline Generation
step1.description: Analyzes a viral video's structure to create a tailored outline for your new video topic.

step2.name: Full Script Writing
step2.description: Writes a complete script from the outline, matching your channel's tone and specified word count.

step3.name: Voiceover (VO) Script Compilation
step3.description: Compiles the final script into a clean, voice-actor-ready format, stripping production notes and adding branding.

step4.name: Title & Thumbnail Prompt Generation
step4.description: Generates catchy titles and creative thumbnail prompts based on the final script.

step5.name: SEO Distribution Package
step5.description: Creates an SEO-optimized description, tags, and social media posts.

step6.name: Visual Prompt Generation
step6.description: Analyzes the VO script to generate a complete set of photo-realistic image prompts for the video.

step7.name: Prompt Table Builder
step7.description: Converts the visual prompts from the previous step into a structured table and CSV block.

step8.name: SEO & Metadata Generation
step8.description: Creates a comprehensive SEO profile and an FFmpeg-ready metadata file based on all previous steps.

step9.name: SRT Timecode Merge
step9.description: Matches visual prompts to dialogue timestamps from a provided SRT file to create a synchronized shot list.
